thumb.name: Two Hearts Are One Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMichael and Jane%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELove makes two hearts one.%3Cbr%3ECongratulations

thumb.name: Floral Ribbon Cake
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EJoan and Mark. we've shared so much as friends that sharing in the happiness of your wedding is a very special joy -- a time to celebrate the love of two wonderful people who mean so much%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay today be just the beginning of a beautiful marriage and all your dreams come true.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Sweet Memories Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EDavid%3Cbr%3E%26%3Cbr%3EElizabeth...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay every memory you share%3Cbr%3Ebe sweet.%3Cbr%3Eevery today you share%3Cbr%3Ebe happy.%3Cbr%3Eevery tomorrow you share%3Cbr%3Ebe beautiful.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations%3Cbr%3Eon Your Engagement
